name: Shape Dungeon - A (Poorly) Drawn Game
description:
Shape Dungeon is a (poorly) drawn game by Ankur. 

Grow your party of shapes and use them to conquer enemy shapes. Leverage those high school geometry skills to combine polygons into even bigger polygons. Remember those pre-school learnings to figure out which colors will combine to give you the most advantageous outcome. 

This game was created after ~5 weeks of learning to program. I have no formal artistic or programming experience. This game was meant to be more complex than my last published game (9! The Game). I hope you enjoy, feel free to leave feedback.
